## StringSelectMenuOptionProps

<GenerationInfo sourceFile="packages/commandkit/src/components/interactive/select-menu/SelectMenu.ts" sourceLine="163" packageName="commandkit" />

Represents the properties for a string select menu option.
This can be either a SelectMenuComponentOptionData or an APISelectMenuOption.

```ts title="Signature"
type StringSelectMenuOptionProps = | SelectMenuComponentOptionData
  | APISelectMenuOption
```
